name: echo
description: A module for generating greeting messages with timestamps

functions.name: echo
functions.description: Generates a greeting message with the current time
functions.definition: Define a function that takes a "name" string as input and returns a string in the form "Hello, ${name}, it is ${time}".

functions.name: echo2
functions.description: Generates a greeting message with the current time
functions.definition: Define a function that takes a "name" string as input and returns a string in the form "Hello, ${name}, it is ${time}".

functions.name: echo3
functions.description: Generates a greeting message with the current time
functions.definition: Define a function that takes a "name" string as input and returns a string in the form "Hello, ${name}, it is ${time}".

functions.name: formatTime
functions.description: Formats the current time according to the specified format string
functions.definition: Define a function that takes a format string (e.g., "HH:mm", "hh:mm a") and returns the current time formatted accordingly.

tests.name: basic_greeting
tests.definition: Verify that with input "Bob" we get the output "Hello, Bob, it is 12:34:56".

tests.name: empty_name
tests.definition: Verify that with input "" we get the output "Hello, , it is 12:34:56".

tests.name: 24_hour_format
tests.definition: Verify that with input "HH:mm" we get the output "14:30".

tests.name: 12_hour_format
tests.definition: Verify that with input "hh:mm a" we get the output "02:30 PM".
